head.title: Meghan Barber and John J. Duval Jr.

hedline.hl1: Meghan Barber and John J. Duval Jr.

block.p: Meghan Barber, the daughter of Floss Barber Hoover of Philadelphia and Zorie Joseph Barber of Chino Hills, Calif., was married yesterday to John Joseph Duval Jr., the son of Mr. and Mrs. Duval of Flat Rock, N.C. The Rev. Alex Viola, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Princeton University Chapel in Princeton, N.J.

Mrs. Duval, 26, graduated cum laude from Princeton. She is a coordinator in the appraisals department of the business development division at Sotheby's in New York. Her father is a publishing consultant. The bride's mother is an interior designer in Philadelphia.

Meghan Barber, the daughter of Floss Barber Hoover of Philadelphia and Zorie Joseph Barber of Chino Hills, Calif., was married yesterday to John Joseph Duval Jr., the son of Mr. and Mrs. Duval of Flat Rock, N.C. The Rev. Alex Viola, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Princeton University Chapel in Princeton, N.J.

Mrs. Duval, 26, graduated cum laude from Princeton. She is a coordinator in the appraisals department of the business development division at Sotheby's in New York. Her father is a publishing consultant. The bride's mother is an interior designer in Philadelphia.
Mr. Duval, 26, is a financial consultant at Merrill Lynch & Company in New York. He graduated from Elon College. The bridegroom's father is a vice president at Merrill Lynch in Hendersonville, N.C.
